description:
When rocky chunder and slabs are common features on your rides, you need a tire designed to bite into that type of terrain. Engineered to help you excel on hard-packed and rocky trails, the Force AM2 delivers that “on rails” feeling.

  • GUM-X rubber uses a single compound that balances rolling efficiency and grip
  • Tread optimized for hard surfaces
  • Large outer blocks improve cornering and overall handling
  • Gravity Shield 3x60 TPI casing for increased puncture resistance without sacrificing ride comfort
  • Tubeless ready
name: Michelin Force AM2 Competition 29x2.4 Tire
